thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Voula

author: Voula
title: Voula
text:
Nikolas has been managing my property for about 10 years now. His clear and transparent communication between agent, tenant and landlord has enabled us to keep the same tenant for over 10 years. Nikolas is always prompt and efficient with any action required both from a tenant and landlord's perspective. At all times he offers expert and sensible advice.
Given Nikolas advocates for both the tenant and landlord, I highly recommend Nikolas as your agent for your needs.
